title: Patient Interaction Simulation-Based Education: Application of the Gagné Model

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A practice-centered environment for pre-service teachers to assume professional roles, emphasizing BYOD-based personal device usage and formative assessment

learning_goals: Learners can perform patient identification procedures in VR simulations with 90% accuracy.
Learners can apply empathetic communication skills at over 85% proficiency in standardized patient interaction scenarios.
Learners can identify five or more risk factors in the blood collection process and propose response strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
